name: R.E.V.E.R.S.
description:
R.E.V.E.R.S is a little solo puzzle game where the player influence the state of his robot with cards in order to help him survive his journey through a hostile environment. This game was made in 48 hours for the Spriiing Game Jam 2023.

Activate your cards by clicking on it or by using the 1/2 keys or up/left/right or A/B on a controller.
